title: 14-day discipline reset
excerpt: Build a disciplined execution system: gates, cooldowns, exit language, rule drift checks, and weekly reviews.

lessons.title: Day 1 | Trader profile & triggers
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Separate impulse from behavior: triggers, emotions, bodily cues, external stimuli.

## Actions
- Log 10 impulses: what did you want to do?
- Label triggers: FOMO / revenge / confirmation / boredom

## Output
- Trigger map
- Trigger → behavior mapping

lessons.title: Day 2 | Execution gate
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Turn entry into an expression after conditions pass.

## Minimal fields
- Regime
- Location type
- Force score (0-5)
- One-sentence falsification
- Risk caps

## Homework
Write 5+ fail rules.

lessons.title: Day 3 | Post-loss protocol
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Avoid the second mistake after a loss.

## Example rules
- 2 losses: pause 30 min + review only
- 3 losses: stop for the day + publish a review

## Homework
Write your recovery conditions.

lessons.title: Day 4 | Overtrading
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Use cadence and windows to control frequency.

## Actions
- Define trading windows
- Write a no-trade list (8+ items)

## Output
- Trading schedule
- No-trade list

lessons.title: Day 5 | Exit language
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Turn exits from feelings into evidence changes.

## Actions
- For 5 trades: 1 falsification + 1 exit action
- Review: did you execute?

lessons.title: Day 6 | Rule drift detection
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Detect how rules slowly loosen.

## Actions
- List 5 drift patterns
- Write one stop trigger per drift

lessons.title: Day 7 | Weekly review
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Convert errors into next-week prescriptions.

## Outputs
- Evidence chain
- Top 3 violations
- 3 corrective actions

## Homework
Publish one weekly review and score execution.

title: Weekly breakdown camp
excerpt: Turn information into direction and bounds via consistent fields. Train stable market perception.

lessons.title: Module 1 | Regime template
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Identify regimes consistently: trend/range/transition.

## Output
- Regime checklist
- MTF alignment table

lessons.title: Module 2 | Key location template
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Mark boundaries and risk frames.

## Output
- Location types
- Falsification placement

lessons.title: Module 3 | Liquidity & narrative
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Write news as structural impact, not feelings.

## Output
- Narrative notes
- Event log fields

lessons.title: Module 4 | Volatility & parameters
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Make parameters adapt to volatility.

## Output
- Volatility tiers
- Parameter rules

lessons.title: Module 5 | One-page plan
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Turn weekly report into a daily plan.

## Output
- Allowed scenarios
- No-trade zones
- Risk caps

lessons.title: Module 6 | Review & iterate
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Correct interpretation via reviews.

## Output
- Error taxonomy
- Next-week actions

lessons.title: Module 7 | Output standard
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Define what a good weekly report looks like.

## Standard
- Structure + actions + falsification
- Reviewable and reusable

title: Price action: Force × Location × Falsification
excerpt: Read charts with falsifiable language: impulse/pullback quality, boundaries, and failure triggers.

lessons.title: Lesson 1 | Force scoring
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Score force instead of memorizing patterns.

## Output
- Force scorecard
- Screenshot template

lessons.title: Lesson 2 | Location & boundaries
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Express near boundaries, not in the middle.

## Output
- Boundary card
- Pivot SOP

lessons.title: Lesson 3 | Falsification
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
If you can’t write it, you have no boundary.

## Output
- Falsification card
- Failure library fields

lessons.title: Lesson 4 | Breakout/retest
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Retest validity is the edge.

## Output
- Retest checklist
- Falsification placement

lessons.title: Lesson 5 | Pullback/continuation
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Trade continuation quality, not the pullback itself.

## Output
- Pullback template
- Continuation conditions

lessons.title: Lesson 6 | Reversal sequences
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
Use sequences to avoid guessing.

## Output
- Reversal sequence list
- Delay rules

lessons.title: Lesson 7 | Case training
lessons.contentMd:
## Goal
One chart, three sentences: Force / Location / Falsification.

## Output
- Template
- 10-chart homework
